c74object.name: fl.register~
c74object.digest: Store and recall a vector frame locally.
c74object.description: The left input triggers recall, whilst the right input stores (with or without output).

entry.name: 0. /mode [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the behaviour of the right input: store - stores without output. pass - stores and outputs.
[0] - store [1] - pass
